divs: Sighting Details A massive obilisk landed in a field near mycollege campus at The State University of New york at New Paltz. I was alone inthe field, but not under the influence of anything.It was black as it landed,but lightened to grayish silver after landing. A door opened, a small being,also grayish silver peeked out and took a black netting device (like a poolcleaner) and swiped through the air. The door closed and the obilisk liftedstraight up and was gone.Im very scared. Ive never been someone who believed.If you call, please let whoever picks up know why youre calling. Im anxious totalk to people who understand.
trends: There have been 4 other sightings in New Paltz
There were no other sightings in New Paltz on or around November 5th 2001
Summary: Tall ship lands, door opens, net appears, flies aw.
